Name: Chrono Survival
About the game: On the eve of the end of the world, become the last hope for the world by standing alone against thousands of monsters. Chrono Survival is a hyper arcade rogue-lite game that combines simple gameplay and challenge. Inspired by games such as Vampire Survivors, Path of Exile and The Binding of Isaac. Minimalistic gameplay and deep building. Key features: Many abilities and opportunities to combine and modify them. Achievements and unlocks. Diverse enemies. Mighty bosses. Different game events make every run varied. Twitch integration.
